019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApisApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.CustomObjectsApi;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIGroup;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMap;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMapList;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1GroupVersionForDiscovery;
032import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaim;
034import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PersistentVolumeClaimList;
035import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1Pod;
036import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodList;
037import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
038import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
039import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.DeleteOptions;
040import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
041import java.util.Optional;
042
043/**
044 * Helpers for K8s API.
045 */
046@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.UseUtilityClass",
047    "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
048public class K8s {
049
050    /**
051     * Given a groupVersion, returns only the version.
052     *
053     * @param groupVersion the group version
054     * @return the string
055     */
056    public static String version(String groupVersion) {
057        return groupVersion.substring(groupVersion.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * Get PVC API.
062     *
063     * @param client the client
064     * @return the generic kubernetes api
065     */
066    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1PersistentVolumeClaim,
067            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList> pvcApi(ApiClient client) {
068        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1PersistentVolumeClaim.class,
069            V1PersistentVolumeClaimList.class, "", "v1",
070            "persistentvolumeclaims", client);
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Get config map API.
075     *
076     * @param client the client
077     * @return the generic kubernetes api
078     */
079    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1ConfigMap,
080            V1ConfigMapList> cmApi(ApiClient client) {
081        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1ConfigMap.class,
082            V1ConfigMapList.class, "", "v1", "configmaps", client);
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Get pod API.
087     *
088     * @param client the client
089     * @return the generic kubernetes api
090     */
091    public static GenericKubernetesApi<V1Pod, V1PodList>
092            podApi(ApiClient client) {
093        return new GenericKubernetesApi<>(V1Pod.class, V1PodList.class, "",
094            "v1", "pods", client);
095    }
096
097    /**
098     * Get the API for a custom resource.
099     *
100     * @param client the client
101     * @param group the group
102     * @param kind the kind
103     * @param namespace the namespace
104     * @param name the name
105     * @return the dynamic kubernetes api
106     * @throws ApiException the api exception
107     */
108    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseObjectForClearerAPI")
109    public static Optional<DynamicKubernetesApi> crApi(ApiClient client,
110            String group, String kind, String namespace, String name)
111            throws ApiException {
112        var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
113        var crdVersions = apis.getGroups().stream()
114            .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(group)).findFirst()
115            .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
116            .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
117        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
118        for (var crdVersion : crdVersions) {
119            var crdApiRes = coa.getAPIResources(group, crdVersion)
120                .getResources().stream().filter(r -> kind.equals(r.getKind()))
121                .findFirst();
122            if (crdApiRes.isEmpty()) {
123                continue;
124            }
125            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
126            var crApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(group,
127                crdVersion, crdApiRes.get().getName(), client);
128            var customResource = crApi.get(namespace, name);
129            if (customResource.isSuccess()) {
130                return Optional.of(crApi);
131            }
132        }
133        return Optional.empty();
134    }
135
136    /**
137     * Get an object from its metadata.
138     *
139     * @param <T> the generic type
140     * @param <LT> the generic type
141     * @param api the api
142     * @param meta the meta
143     * @return the object
144     */
145    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
146            Optional<T>
147            get(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, V1ObjectMeta meta) {
148        var response = api.get(meta.getNamespace(), meta.getName());
149        if (response.isSuccess()) {
150            return Optional.of(response.getObject());
151        }
152        return Optional.empty();
153    }
154
155    /**
156     * Delete an object.
157     *
158     * @param <T> the generic type
159     * @param <LT> the generic type
160     * @param api the api
161     * @param object the object
162     */
163    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
164            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object)
165                    throws ApiException {
166        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
167            object.getMetadata().getName()).throwsApiException();
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Delete an object.
172     *
173     * @param <T> the generic type
174     * @param <LT> the generic type
175     * @param api the api
176     * @param object the object
177     */
178    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
179            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object,
180                    DeleteOptions options) throws ApiException {
181        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
182            object.getMetadata().getName(), options).throwsApiException();
183    }
184
185    /**
186     * Apply the given patch data.
187     *
188     * @param <T> the generic type
189     * @param <LT> the generic type
190     * @param api the api
191     * @param existing the existing
192     * @param update the update
193     * @throws ApiException the api exception
194     */
195    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
196            T apply(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T existing, String update)
197                    throws ApiException {
198        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
199        opts.setForce(true);
200        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
201        var response = api.patch(existing.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
202            existing.getMetadata().getName(), V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
203            new V1Patch(update), opts).throwsApiException();
204        return response.getObject();
205    }
206
207}
